name: Word Journey.
description:
Did you have a long, tiring day? This game will help you unwind and regain your calm.

Just relax on a comfy couch, and start your moment of peace by solving the soothing word puzzles in this game.

Enjoy your time while witnessing breathtaking sceneries in the game. Each comes with own unique scenes that take place after you've completed each puzzle. The words you reveal will decide what would happen next. Unlock more scenes as you reach higher levels in the game and feel the moment of inner peace, just for you.

Get back to your roots and enjoy nature through this game.

How do you feel? Leave us your story via info@alegrium.com.
